import React, {Component, Fragment} from 'react' import Link from "next/link"; import DropDownMenu from '../DDM' import css from "../../styles/main.scss"; import withSizes from 'react-sizes'; const MainNav = ({isMobile, isTablet}) => ( <>
{isTablet ? null :
真人娛樂 體育博彩 賓果彩票 電子遊戲 捕魚王 優惠活動
}
); const mapSizesToProps = ({width}) => ({ isMobile: width < 480, isTablet: width >= 480 && width < 1024 }); export default withSizes(mapSizesToProps)(MainNav);
